definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 毫[hao2]/archaic variant of 乙[yi3]
China Central Television (CCTV), PRC state TV network

sentences.english: On the grounds of modern emergency medicine, defibrillation has to be performed in combination with CPR.
sentences.chinese: 根據現代急救理念，電除顫必須與心肺復甦聯合應用。

sentences.english: Pressor response was induced by electrical stimulation of the hypothalamic defence area.
sentences.chinese: 電刺激下丘腦“防禦反應區”誘發升壓反應。

sentences.english: I also like that the tech is supposed to be durable, reducing e-waste.
sentences.chinese: 另外，這項技術是可持續耐用的，能減少電損耗。

sentences.english: Why do Chinese Chuan Denso are direct trade export business?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼華川電裝做的都是直接貿易出口業務？

sentences.english: The first posts are used for electrical connection and are made of copper according to an embodiment.
sentences.chinese: 所述多個第一柱用於電連接且根據實施例由銅製成。

sentences.english: The passenger carrying capacity of a tramcar is nominal figure listed in gazette schedules.
sentences.chinese: 電車的載客量是憲報刊登的名義上數字。

sentences.english: Don't accelerate too slowly in hybrid and keep batteries charged
sentences.chinese: 混合動力車加速不要過慢，保持電池在充滿電狀態。

sentences.english: In chapter 5, ECT techniques for scanning inspection of defects in multi-layered structures are studied.
sentences.chinese: 第五章研究了多層導電結構缺陷電渦流掃描檢測技術。

sentences.english: A window frame made of insulating materials according to the principle of an electric fly-flap.
sentences.chinese: 根據電蚊蠅拍的原理，用絕緣材料做窗框。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of pulmonary vein isolation on atrial depolarization.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討成功的肺靜脈電隔離對心房除極的影響。

sentences.english: Hydrogen is easily ignited by heat, open flames, electrical sparks, and static electricity.
sentences.chinese: 電系統爲點火，喇叭，燈光，發熱器和起動器提供電。

sentences.english: I would like to discuss with you our agency of your electric fans.
sentences.chinese: 我想同貴方商談你們電電扇的署理問題。

sentences.english: The LP casing blade of unit 3 in Tuoketuo Power Plant is broken after only three months operation.
sentences.chinese: 託電3號機組低壓缸葉片運行僅3個月就發生了斷裂。

sentences.english: Electrodepositing technology of Ag-Cd alloy from cyanide bath was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了氰化物體系電沉積銀鎘合金的工藝。

sentences.english: Electrical contact is made with the leaf springs by in each case one of the conductor tracks.
sentences.chinese: 板簧各與至少一個印製導線電觸點接通。

sentences.english: Any stuff can't be left inside the eletrical cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 電箱內禁止存放任何物品。
